title: MTBseq-nf: Enabling Scalable Tuberculosis Genomics "Big Data" Analysis Through a User-Friendly Nextflow Wrapper for MTBseq Pipeline.
abstract: The MTBseq pipeline, published in 2018, was designed to address bioinformatics challenges in tuberculosis (TB) research using whole-genome sequencing (WGS) data. It was the first publicly available tool on GitHub to perform full analysis of WGS data for
